PM2AUD.original: ~z~Me brother wouldn't take too kindly to that now would he?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你要是敢这么说，我哥可不会给你好脸色看。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~How much you lose on that Swingers game last week?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~上周浪人队的比赛你输了多少钱？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Don't worry about Gordo and Mikey, they ain't gonna have no troubles. You'll get your share.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~用不着担心Gordo和Mikey，他们不会有事的。分成会给你的。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~-Good, let's go.~n~-Alright, alright, lets go. Let's do this.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~－好，出发吧。~n~－可以，可以，走吧。开工了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Nicely done, me boy. Nicely done. Like taking candy from a baby.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~干得好，哥们。干得好。小菜一碟嘛。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Packie, you hang out in some strange places.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Packie，你怎么老去这种奇怪的地方。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You know that Purgatory is called what it is because people were so scared of the McRearys.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你也知道，Purgatory(炼狱)是因~n~人们对McReary家族的畏惧得名的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It's called that because people found the McRearys' stories so fuckin' boring.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~是因为人们发现McReary家族的故事太他妈无聊了才叫这名的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It's an Ancelotti operation. Ray tipped us off about a big payoff they just got.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~是Ancelotti家族开的。Ray放风给我们说他们刚进了一票大的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~They're clean as a fuckin' whistle. One previous owner...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~这些破枪干净得很。一个前主人...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~A guy who bats one-fifty hits a three run homer. Bullshit!
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~一个打击率只有十五分之一的选手打了个三分本垒打出来。扯淡吧！

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Alright, it's up and over the fence.
~z~Okay, if you say you are right, you are right.
~z~Don't go dropping too much green after this.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~别把白花花的银子花在这上面。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That don't mean I can drive one. Fuck it though, I'll give it a try.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~乘船来又不等于开船来。不过管它呢，我先试试吧。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I've got it boys. Prettiest thing I seen in all me days. I'll tell you that.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我拿到了，小子们。要我说这是我这辈子见过的最漂亮的东西。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Only places an honest criminal can make any money are these shit holes.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~老实的罪犯能挣到钱的地方只有粪坑了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~First you take me to a fish market and now a waste plant.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~先带我去鱼市，现在又是垃圾场。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~There's got to be a pizza parlor on this island coz I ain't never seen so many Italians.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~从来没见过这么多意大利人，这座岛上肯定是有家披萨店。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Try to keep the money dry, won't ya? I don't know how my bookie's gonna be about wet notes..
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~尽量别把钱弄湿好吧？我可不知道我的赌场代理收不收湿钞票。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~And there should be a boat docked out back for the getaway.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~后面应该还有一条船用于逃跑。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Pecorino's a type a cheese. Pegorinos is a bunch of guido gangsters outta Alderney.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Pecorino是一种奶酪。Pegorino家族~n~是Alderney一带的黑帮意呆佬。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Sure, me boy. There's the boat just out there. I'll race ya.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~当然，哥们。那边有条船。看看谁游得快。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~What you got to worry about? There's only every virus known to man floating about in this river. Come on.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你有什么好怕的？这条河不过是集齐了人类已知的所有病毒而已。来吧。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~When taking candy from babies you are not meant to have to kill a load of their employees.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~吃小菜的时候可用不着把饭店员工都给杀了。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Can't have a dollar in his pocket without spending it at a card game.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~兜里藏不住一个子儿，全拿去打牌了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Alright boys, if Ray is correct then the money's going to be kept in the office in the main building.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~好了小子们，如果Ray说的没错，那笔钱就在主楼的办公室里。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~If the Ancelottis hear we've been spending it up they might finger us for this job.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~要是让Ancelotti家族听说我们花钱太厉害，还不得把我们在做的活计给暴露了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~since you put that way, I'm in.
~z~Why'd you have to go and sink it? Now we're swimming to Dukes.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你丫沉船干啥？现在我们得游回Dukes了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That's Francis down to a fucking T. I don't even know if he realizes what a crook he is.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Francis骨子里就是这样的人。我都怀疑他知不知道自己到底有多坏。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~If that happens, the bookies will be the least of your worries.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~到时候赌场的那点债就不值一提了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You guys take the money and meet me back at Ma's. Me and Niko are taking a swim.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你们俩带着钱走，到我妈地方会合。我跟Niko用游的。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I hope you're right for my sake.
~z~Michael, Gordo watch our backs. Make sure none of these wops tries to come up behind us.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Michael，Gordo，替我们断后。确保没人能来追击我们。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Gotta make hay while the sun shines.
~z~Well, the risk is... we all die a very slow and painful death.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~风险顶多是...我们一起痛苦地慢慢死去。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I hear that Francis McReary is your brother.
~z~If ya want a pair of armbands you ain't gonna find them there. Get in.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你要是想要游泳臂圈的话，这里可没有。下来吧。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~What the hell have you done? I thought you were a damn sailor?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你他妈的做了什么？我还以为你丫是个水手？(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You have a lot to learn about the English language, my friend.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你这个英语还是要去学一学啊。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~My cousin, Roman, he has this gambling problem as well.
~z~Shit, you've sunk it. Looks like we're swimming to Dukes.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~操，你丫沉船了。看来我们得游回Dukes了。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Don't trouble yourself about me, Packie. I'm sitting on my money.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我你就不用担心，Packie。我是个铁公鸡。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Can you drive a boat? You got to this fine country in a boat didn't ya, Niko?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你会开船吗？你是不是就是乘船来这个好国家的，Niko？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Us McRearys are under the fucking radar nowadays. It ain't a problem.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们McReary家族现在转战地下了，不会有问题的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Coming, Ma... you boys play nice, now...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~来了，妈...男孩子们要好好相处哦...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Mikey, maybe you and me should take this cash down to Vice City. Have some fun.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Mikey，我们俩还是带着钱去罪恶都市吧。去那儿玩玩。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~What's mine is his. We are cousins.
~z~Scared of the water are we, Niko?
~z~A whole lot to learn. I only wish I had the time to teach you.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你要学的还多得很呢。但愿我有空教你。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Come on, Niko, use your head. There are four of us.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~拜托，Niko，动动脑子。我们有四个人。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I don't care so much about us, as long as the money makes it home safe.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我不担心我们，只要能把钱运回家就行。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~So is you down, boy, or is you out?
~z~Then I am quite sure you and mister Niko here will have fun on your 'play date'.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~那你和Niko先生这次的「娱乐邀约」肯定会很愉悦喽。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Ancelottis, eh? I can't tell none of those wop families apart.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Ancelotti家族，啊？我可分不清这些南蛮子的家族。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~What's that say about you then, Gordo? If you're taking orders from Packie.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你说这话是几个意思，Gordo？还想不想跟Packie混了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~If you think I'm letting one of these reprobates sit on my knee, you're crazy.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~要是你觉得我会让俩人渣坐在我腿上，你就是疯了。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~ It makes me sick to me damn stomach. See you, Niko.
~z~Michael, Gordon tries anything you fucking shoot him. Understand?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Michael，Gordon有什么用什么干他们就对了。懂了没？(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~My brother Gerry is going to be fucking ecstatic.
~z~I don't give a shit what you're doing with your cut. All I care about is you holding up your end on the job.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我他妈才不管你那份钱要拿去干啥。只要你丫不掉链子就成。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Both of me boys is gone. I got to re-evaluate this shit.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我的两个手下都死了。我得重新算下这票值不值了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Are these his dollars he's spending, or yours?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~他花的这些钱，是他的还是你的？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Take us out to the waste management plant under the Algonquin Bridge on Colony Island, big man.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~带我们去Algonquin大桥下的垃圾处理厂，~n~Colony岛的那个，大块头。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I like your attitude, Niko. I think we're gonna keep getting on real well.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我喜欢你的态度，Niko。我觉得我们关系会很好的。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~He only put on that cassock so he could pocket the change in the collection plate. Fact.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~他只是想穿上长袍，然后就能把募款盘里的零钱藏自己袋子里了。真的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~We'll see you back at the house, Packie.
~z~And the money is good, very good indeed.
~z~Ahh, fuck. It's a massacre. This ain't gonna be easy to explain.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~啊，操。完全是在屠杀。这可不好解释。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That was fucking beautiful. We did ourselves proud.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~太他妈漂亮了。我们证明了自己。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Them guidos use you for what they like, if the Peg asked Gerald to wipe his ass he probably would.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~这些意呆佬爱怎么使唤就怎么使唤你，就算Peg叫Gerald帮他擦屁股，他估计都肯擦的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That's got to be the office up there. I can smell the fucking money.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~应该就在上面那个办公室里了。我他妈都能闻到钱味儿了。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~We did it. Top of the fucking world. Here's your share. Don't go spending it in any Italian restaurants.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们做到了，这他妈就是世界第一。这份是你的，不过别拿到意大利餐馆去花。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~The whole city is turning into a fucking theme park.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~整座城都快他妈成主题公园了，

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Listening to them was like being in Purgatory.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~听他们讲这些故事就跟身处炼狱一样痛苦。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I think they're fucking with ya, Packie. They're laughing at ya.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我看他们就是想搞你，Packie。现在就在笑你呢。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Can you get us a car, man? I'm afraid these two idiots can't drive for shit.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你能给我们弄辆车吗，兄弟？我看这俩傻屌多半不会开车。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I'd like to see him try it. Not gonna happen with the things Gerry knows.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我是无所谓。只要Gerry知道的那些黑料还在，这就不可能。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~How were we supposed to get that money outta there if our getaway boat gets trashed before we're even on board?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们还没上船船就没了，这他妈还怎么把钱带出去？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Fucking Gordon got himself hit. We should regroup at the house.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~狗逼Gordon没命了。只能回家重新规划了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Hey Packie, I'll go get the money. Cover me, will you?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~喂，Packie，我上去拿钱，你负责掩护，好吧？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Our family used to be bigger than all them Mafia families put together. Back in the day, that is.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们家族比这些黑手党家族加起来还大。不过那是以前了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You know Frankie do ya? I got a story for you if you do.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你认识Frankie是吧？认识的话我给你讲个故事。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~He swears to this day that he wanted to serve the Lord. Gerry knows the truth though.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~直到现在他还整天发誓他想侍奉主。不过Gerry知道实情。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Fuck you, Gordon. I'll fucking come back there and kick your fucking ass in a minute.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~去你妈的，Gordon。老子这就到后排来收拾你丫的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~What do ya fucking call this? Get us a car we can all fit in.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你丫管这叫什么东西？弄辆我们乘得下的车来。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Why are we always waitin' for you?
~z~Michael's out. Does anyone know where he keeps his cash? Fuck it, I'm gone.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Michael挂了。有哪位知道他钱都存哪儿了吗？操蛋，我走了。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~All that money floating in the Humboldt River.
~z~You shouldn't save too much, Michael. You never know, you might get hit by a bus tomorrow.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你不该太节俭的，Michael。指不定明天你就被车撞死了呢。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That sounds like the Francis McReary I met.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~听起来还是挺像我遇到的那个Francis McReary的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Don't fucking worry about it. They'll just figure it was another one of the five families.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~用不着担心这个。他们会当这是五大家族的另一批人干的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Okay kids, I got the cash. Shit! Looks like we're not the only ones after it.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，小子们，钱我拿到了。操！看来想要这笔钱的不止我们一个。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Not gonna throw it at the bookies like Gordon over here. I'm saving it up so...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~一分钱都不会扔到赌场里去的，不像Gordon那样。我把钱存着，以后就...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Gordo's down. This ain't good. I'm outta here.
~z~Alright boys, let's go inside and find this money.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~好了小子们，进去把钱找出来吧。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It'd be my fucking pleasure. See you at your ma's.
~z~I'm goin' up to get the cash. Cover me, Niko.
~z~The only thing they're doing for Gordon is keeping the bookies off his back for another week.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~再多的钱也只能让Gordon从赌场主手里多活一个礼拜。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~These places are messed up. I think this Ray guy is fucking with you.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~净是些乱七八糟的地方。我看那个叫Ray的是存心搞你。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Providing the Ancelottis don't figure out it was us that ripped them off.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~只要没被Ancelotti家族发现是我们干的就行。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Packie's fucking bought it. What am I gonna tell his brother? Shit.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~妈的Packie没了，这我怎么跟他哥交代？操。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Fuck, Packie's down. I ain't hanging around.
~z~Course they are. Cosa Nostra and all that shit.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~当然是了。都是美国黑手党之流。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~No one's fucking with me, Niko. This is how things work here.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~没有人敢搞我，Niko。只是这里就是这样。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~...so the plan was they were gonna hide the diamonds in the Queen's ass!
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~...结果他们的计划是把钻石藏在女王的屁眼里！

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Is the money good? What's the risk?
~z~You think even these Alderney guidos would have the balls to do that?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你以为连这些Alderney的意呆佬都有胆子笑我们？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Get your fucking hands off my fucking sister, boy...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~把你丫的猪蹄从老子妹妹身上拿开，小子...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~We're talking, not having casual sex, Patrick...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们不过是聊两句，又没有乱搞性关系，Patrick...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Not this shit again. I heard this speech a million times. The McRearys ran the city.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~别说这些狗屁了。这套话我都听了几百万回了。McReary家族在城里呼风唤雨。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It's the fucking Pegorinos, man. We're workin for them.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~那他妈叫Pegorino家族，兄弟。我们就在替他们干活。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~you're only getting your hands on one of those things, you maniac, and it ain't going to be my Katie.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~二者只能得其一，你这疯子。不过我妹你就别想了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I am not so familiar with these English phrases, but isn't that meant to mean something was easy?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我不是很懂这些英语俗语，不过这句不是用来说这事很简单的吗？(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Alright, we're heading over to the docks in Dukes. Make it happen.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~好了，我们要向Dukes的码头进发。好好开吧。(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Shit, the boys is dead. I ain't hanging around. Later, Niko.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~操，人都死了。我也不留这儿了。回见，Niko。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Shut it, Gordo. Ray's given us a tip off about a big payment the Ancelottis just got.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~闭嘴，Gordo。Ray给我们放了风，是关于Ancelotti家族刚到手的一笔大钱的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You think they're having a laugh with Gerald, Gordo?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~要么你看看他们在Gerald面前还笑不笑得出来，Gordo？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~He may have a badge, but I tell you for a fact he's as crooked as the rest of us McRearys.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~他的确是个警察，不过我跟你讲，实际上他跟我们McReary家族的其他人一样坏。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I pray after the amount of practice you've had you'd know the difference.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你这样身经百战的人总该知道区别吧。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You're just worried he'll start clamping down on you, ain't ya Packie?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我看你只是怕他带队取缔你吧，Packie？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~People was scared to say their name let alone come near their place in Purgatory.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~人们连他们的名字都不敢提，更别说靠近他们在Purgatory的地盘了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Or are we gonna have to kill you?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~还是要我们就地把你给做了？

PM2AUD.original: ~z~you're only getting your hands on one of those things, you maniac, and it ain't going to be my Katie.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~二者你只能得其一，你这危险分子，不过不准你拿我的Katie。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~More so. At least we ain't fucking hypocrites. Kate's the only decent one.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~可能还更坏一点。至少我们不来伪君子那套。~n~Kate是唯一一个正派的。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Shut up and think about the money. If that don't work, think about my sister. I tell you though,
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~闭上嘴想想这笔钱吧。要是这还不行，就想想我妹妹。不过话我先撂这儿，

PM2AUD.original: ~z~We're all gonna do real well outta this.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~这次我们都得拿出真本事来。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Fucking with us or not, these jobs pay the bills, don't they?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~不管是不是搞我们，反正这些差事会给钱就对了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Life was great. We were in charge.
~z~We made it, Niko. Who'd a thought we'd fucking survive that?
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们做到了，Niko。谁他妈能想到我们能活着出来？(BETA)

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It looks like he ain't too pleased with the dates you been taking him on, Patrick.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~看来他不太喜欢你挑的约会地点啊，Patrick。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~I bet. Model community leader, my ass.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我就知道。社会模范领袖，笑尿了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Here we are boys, moment of fucking truth.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~我们到了，小子们，拿点本事出来。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~It's fucking true. I'd like to hear you tell Gerald that it's a boring story.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~这他妈是事实。我看你敢不敢跟Gerald说这是个无聊的故事。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Shut up, Gordon. So, Niko, when Francis and Gerald was growing up, Frankie becomes an altar boy.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~闭嘴，Gordon。听好，Niko，~n~Francis和Gerald还小的时候，Frankie就成了辅祭男童。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~One leaves you feeling sad and empty and alone...
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~一个让你感到悲伤空虚寂寞...

PM2AUD.original: ~z~You got to learn how to treat a man right.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~你该好好学下怎么对待男人了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~That shit was rigged. I got screwed in the ninth damn inning.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~那他妈是假球。第九局简直他妈吃屎了。

PM2AUD.original: ~z~Gordon, Michael. You hold these boys back while me and Niko make a swim for it with the money.
PM2AUD.translated: ~z~Gordon，Michael，你俩拖住他们，我和Niko先带着钱游过去。
